}\n\n        .card-image {\n          width: 100%;\n          height: 160px;\n          object-fit: cover;\n          border-radius: 10px;\n        }\n\n        .explore-btn {\n          background: #4CAF50;\n          color: white;\n          border: none;\n          padding: 8px 12px;\n          margin-top: 8px;\n          border-radius: 6px;\n          cursor: pointer;\n        }\n\n        /*   display: flex;\n          justify-content: center;\n          align-items: center;\n          backdrop-filter: blur(6px);\n          z-index: 50;\n        }\n\n        .modal-content {\n
